abstract: Dick Cheney, the former vice president, told the conservative radio host Hugh Hewitt that Donald J. Trump’s proposal to bar Muslims from entering the country “goes against everything we stand for.”

headline.main: Verbatim: Dick Cheney Criticizes Donald Trump’s Muslim Policy

snippet: Dick Cheney, the former vice president, told the conservative radio host Hugh Hewitt that Donald J. Trump’s proposal to bar Muslims from entering the country “goes against everything we stand for.”...
